amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, reimburses airports for eligible costs incurred before August 3, 2007, that were previously reimbursed at 90% of such costs. The amendment provides that the Secretary would reimburse such airports an amount equal to the difference for such eligible costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-127 to reimburse airports for eligible costs incurred before August 3, 2007, that were previously reimbursed at 90% of such costs. The Secretary would reimburse such airports an amount equal to the difference for such eligible costs.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..
Diaz-Balart, L. amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent. The modification to the amendment changes the requirements for airports to be eligible for cost reimbursement.
On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, L. amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
